summary:
Fire Blade Sword 
a special sword, its blade is made of fire
descriptionHtml:
Hello, it\'s me again :) and i love  special effects :D

Today we will install a special sword, its blade is made of fire. 

I hope you have fun with this weapon ;)   Endorse if you like :)

i\'m open for all ideas ^_^
\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"
 [color=\"#8B0000\"]**** NEW ****
\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"\"
ALTERNATIVE FLAMING SWORD MOD BY ME ARE HERE http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11162[/color]

=========================================================================================

[color=#FF0000] I  M  P  O  R  T  A  N  T !!! 
=========================
 IF YOU WANT TO HAVE THE FIRE EFFECT ON A 2 HAND SWORD , 
JUST DISENCHANT THE FIRE BLADE FOR LEARN THE ENCHANTEMENT , AND ENCHANT YOU 2HAND SWORD 

ENCHANTEMENT   COMPATIBLE  ONLY  WITH 2 HAND GREAT  SWORD [/color]

=========================================================================================
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Description
===========
Adds forgable Fire Blade one-handed only to the game.



Location
=======
At a forge - Steel weapons section.

Install : 
=======
Extract the archive. Take the folders \"meshes\", \"textures\" and Fire Blade.esp and paste\'em in your Skyrim/Data folder. \"Yes to all\" when asked. Start Skyrim Launcher. Go to Data Files and mark Fire Blade.esp , Ok and play.

Uninstall
=========
Uncheck Fire Blade.esp in Skyrim Launcher Data Files.
Delete:
- Fire Blade.esp from your Data folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\weapons\\FireSword folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\Magic\\EnchFireSwordFX.nif
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons\\FireSword folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\Effects\\flamesPetit01.dds
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\Effects\\fxbrightfashfire.dds



Credits
========
Thanks to Bethesda for the best games.
author: Elixiir
